v1.headline: Investing in remote-first businesses & agencies | 12 businesses, 2 exits. | Founder of HOV
v1.about:
I never wanted to be an entrepreneur.

Getting fired within 2 weeks of my internship at one of the largest investment banks in the world changed the trajectory of my life. I started my first business with my college roommate in 2003. 

21 years later, having started, scaled and sold multiple companies I thank my first manager for firing me everyday. 

Today I manage a portfolio of businesses and investments under my personal holding company called High Output Ventures based out of Singapore. 

I have a very simple thesis of who I am looking to partner and work with:

‣ Is frustrated at their job or a business they are running
‣ Has developed a key skillset and has deep expertise in a specific domain
‣ Wants to start their own business but wants to partner instead of going solo
‣ Has identified an opportunity in the market which fits their skillset and experience
‣ Can pick up the phone and get 10 potential prospects on the phone
‣ Lastly, wants to build the company fully remote

If the above criteria sounds like you, I hope you will send me a DM!

For everyone else, I write and share about my journey and am always looking to connect with individuals who share a passion for entrepreneurship and those who have become world class at their craft.
